Articles.Content:
I just checked the KSP website and it sait that there was a server migration.

Does this mean they are uploading 1.0 right now?
Unlikely. Maybe they're just adopting a larger bandwidth earlier on so tomorrow the server can be ready for the ***massive*** influx of downloads it will get.

> 
> I just checked the KSP website and it sait that there was a server migration.
> Does this mean they are uploading 1.0 right now?

I don't think so- I think it means what it says and their moving their website to new servers... after all when they DO release 1.0 the site is gonna get SLAMMED and they need to get some SERIOUS servers to withstand everyone rushing in all at the same time. 

Hence why I'm gonna DL it closer to 8pm EST. I know the site will have recovered by then giving me easy access without the hassle of the site crashing.

Well i wont be one of the people who destroy there servers, i have school and wojt be home till 4pm GMT then will 9nly have 2.5 hrs before leaving for cadets then 1.5hrs after cadets, so basically i wont be playing 1.0 properly till tuesday and i wont be playin it extensively till friday.
What you think its gonna launch now?
They're putting it on hold when they realized 1.0 wouldn't have clouds.

Guys, this speculation is just going to get people overexcited, please wait for the actual official announcement of the release, thanks ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
